availabilityText: Open to Information Systems, ERP Systems Analyst, Data Analyst, and IT Administrator roles
subtitle: Information Systems, ERP & Data Analyst
title: Hi, I'm David!
introText: I'm an Information Systems and Data Analyst who also works as an IT Administrator, with a Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science and over 9 years supporting academic IT environments, ERP-backed operations, and enterprise reporting workflows. I lead system analysis, data process improvements, and operational reliability delivery across Windows and Linux platforms, with practical experience in Microsoft Dynamics 365, Active Directory, and Azure-enabled identity controls. I also run hands-on home-lab scenarios with enterprise switching, VLAN configuration, IP addressing, and isolated test environments.
